name: Kaushik Parthasarathy
title: Software Engineer | Web Developer | ML Enthusiast
bio: I build elegant, high-performance web experiences and intelligent systems that scale. With a strong foundation in React, Redux, and modern full-stack development, I design modular architectures that make complex systems easy to extend and maintain. My work blends clean design, robust engineering, and applied machine learning to turn ideas into seamless, production-ready products.
